text: Am I About to Repeat My Past So back when I was a Junior in high school I started to lose interest in everything I liked  never wanted to be around anyone  had no motivation for anything whatsoever  After a while  I started having dreams of myself committing suicide and the best way to do so I attempted suicide   times  obviously failing every time  After a while I just decided that if I saw a way out where I didn t have to pull the trigger or tie the noose myself  I d take it I dealt with those suicidal thoughts for about   years  I finally told my parents about it when I was a Sophomore in college  and they were very supportive  Eventually I pulled myself out of it  and I have been fine since  Well  till recently I m starting to notice the same things happening to me that happened when I first started developing depression back in high school  I ve talked to my parents and multiple psychologists  but nothing seems to be helping  If anything  it just keeps getting worse Honestly  I m terrified that I could be going down that road of suicide attempts again  but it feels like no matter what I do that I won t be able to prevent it I don t know what I m hoping to get out of posting this  but maybe posting here could help me  Who knows  Im just completely out of ideas
